description:
Serving the residents of Cuyahoga County and the rest of northeastern Ohio since 1993, Sunny M. Simon, Attorney at Law, has earned a reputation for delivering compassionate counsel and aggressive advocacy to those in need.

A leading full-service practice, our law firm has become the trusted source for many across the region seeking effective, efficient solutions for their legal matters involving divorce and other family law issues, personal injury and property damage claims, bankruptcy, and more.

As testament to our success, we have two law offices in the area, including our location in Cleveland, Ohio, so you are never far from the quality, cost-effective representation you deserve.

Ms. Simon has more than 22 years of legal experience and a diverse background that makes her well-suited to handle your needs no matter how complex or challenging your situation. In all cases, we promise to work closely with you in order to provide the solid advice you need based on your specific needs and goals, and we will remain with you throughout all legal proceedings to ensure the best odds of achieving the positive results you expect.

To receive a free case evaluation from a local attorney you can trust with your most sensitive legal matters, you can contact Sunny M. Simon, Attorney at Law, by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
